house_listing.house_description: Nice starter home. Renovations being completed. Great location. Excellent rental property. Loan is fully assumable. No quals. Seller pays cc. 1 year buyers warranty seller is a licensed agent. Seller will participate in nehemiah program.
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
